title: The Business of Fearing Elizabeth Warren
text:
When Mark Zuckerberg’s colorful comments about Elizabeth Warren hit the internet earlier this week, we were granted an uncharacteristically clear look into the mind of a tech billionaire who normally guards his tongue. The Facebook Inc. founder warned if the Massachusetts senator gets elected president next year and tries to break up the company, Facebook could face an existential legal challenge.

Mr. Zuckerberg believes Facebook would prevail. Nevertheless, the situation would “still suck for us,” he said during a leaked...
description: Mark Zuckerberg isn’t the only executive fretting about what the Massachusetts senator would do if she reaches the White House.
